Text:
Antholz Sprint Ladies (19th Jan 2012):
http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6968587

The ladies pursuit was on at the same time as the XC Team Sprint according to the Eurosport schedule. In the event the Team Sprint wasn't broadcast and the ladies pursuit wasn't repeated. The biathlon repeat later on in the evening was a repeat of the mens pursuit which I'd already got.
